creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: red artist's toshidama seal | censor seals: 吉村 {Yoshimura}, 村松 {Muramatsu}; publisher's seal: 二、錦集堂 {Ni, Kinshūdō}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: A Mirror of Past and Present Examples of Loyalty and Filiel Piety (Konjaku chūkō kagami 今昔忠孝家賀見)
signed: 梓元乃應需香蝶樓豊國画 {hanmoto no ōju Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play Norikake Soga dōchu sugoroku 飾駒曽我通双六, performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1847, 1st month.
title: Actor Nakamura Utaemon IV as Kudō Saemon Suketsune
